column1: Who acted in Tom Hanks’s highest-rated movie?;MATCH (p:Person {name: 'Tom Hanks'})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) WITH m ORDER BY m.imdbRating DESC LIMIT 1 MATCH (m)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(a:Person) RETURN a.name
Which movie starring Keanu Reeves has the most actors in common with a Tom Hanks movie?;"MATCH (meg:Actor {name: ""Keanu Reeves""})-[:ACTED_IN]->(megMovie:Movie)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(commonActor:Actor)
Who directed the most recent movie starring Halle Berry
column2: and which other actors starred in that director’s earlier movies?;"MATCH (p:Person {name: ""Halle Berry""})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Person)

column1: What is the highest-rated movie from the 1990s
column3: and which other films did that director make?;MATCH (m:Movie)-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Person) WHERE m.year >= 1990 AND m.year < 2000 WITH m
column4: d ORDER BY m.imdbRating DESC LIMIT 1 MATCH (d)-[:DIRECTED]->(other:Movie) WHERE other <> m RETURN m.title AS highestRatedMovie

column1: For all movies starring Keanu Reeves
column2: find the director who worked the most times with him and list the co-stars across those collaborations.;"MATCH (keanu:Person {name: ""Keanu Reeves""})-[:ACTED_IN]->(:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Person)

column1: Find the actor who has starred with all from the list of Tom Hanks
column3: and Bruce Willis!;"MATCH (a:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(p:Person) WHERE p.name IN ['Tom Hanks'

column1: Which horror movie has the highest rating
Find the director of the drama movie that has the longest runtime
column2: and list all their movies that are under two hours.;MATCH (d:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre {name: 'Drama'}) WITH d
column3: m ORDER BY m.runtime DESC LIMIT 1 MATCH (d)-[:DIRECTED]->(shortMovies:Movie) WHERE shortMovies.runtime < 120 RETURN d.name AS director

column1: Which 3 actors have starred the most in both a comedy and a thriller?;"MATCH (a:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g1:Genre)
Which pair of actors have starred in the largest number of movies together and who directed most of those collaborations?;"MATCH (a1:Actor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(a2:Actor)
Name the actor who starred with Harrison Ford in at least two movies.;"MATCH (actor:Actor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(harrison:Actor {name: ""Harrison Ford""})

Which actors appear in both a movie directed by Quentin Tarantino and another directed by the Randal Kleiser.;"MATCH (actor:Actor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(movie1:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(director1:Director {name: ""Quentin Tarantino""})
Which actors have starred in movies rated below 5 and also in movies rated above 9?;"MATCH (a:Actor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m1:Movie)
Among comedy films that grossed over $100 million
column2: which one features the oldest actor.;"MATCH (m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre {name: ""Comedy""})

column1: Which directors have themselves acted in at least three of their own movies?;"MATCH (d:Director)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(d)
What is the most common language among movies with a budget lower than 10 million dollars?;"MATCH (m:Movie)
Identify the first 3 genres most frequently linked to movies directed by 'Steven Spielberg'.;"MATCH (d:Director {name: 'Steven Spielberg'})-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre)
List the top 5 oldest actors in the database.;MATCH (a:Actor) WHERE a.born IS NOT NULL RETURN a.name
column2: a.born ORDER BY a.born ASC LIMIT 5

column1: List the top 5 movies with the most IMDb votes.;MATCH (m:Movie) RETURN m.title
column2: m.imdbVotes ORDER BY m.imdbVotes DESC LIMIT 5

column1: Which 3 movies have the highest revenue to budget ratio?;MATCH (m:Movie) WHERE m.budget IS NOT NULL AND m.revenue IS NOT NULL RETURN m.title AS movie
column2: toFloat(m.revenue) / m.budget AS revenueToBudgetRatio ORDER BY revenueToBudgetRatio DESC LIMIT 3

column1: What is the name of the genre associated with the movie 'Jumanji'?;"MATCH (m:Movie {title: ""Jumanji""}) MATCH (m)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre) RETURN g.name"
Name the top 5 movies with the most IMDb votes released before the year 2000.;MATCH (m:Movie) WHERE m.year < 2000 RETURN m.title AS title
column2: m.imdbVotes AS votes ORDER BY m.imdbVotes DESC LIMIT 5

column1: What is the average IMDb rating of movies with a runtime under 90 minutes?;MATCH (m:Movie) WHERE m.runtime < 90 RETURN avg(m.imdbRating) AS averageImdbRating
List the top 3 directors by the number of movies directed.;MATCH (d:Director)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie) RETURN d.name AS director
column2: count(m) AS moviesDirected ORDER BY moviesDirected DESC LIMIT 3

column1: What are the top 5 movies with the highest number of countries involved?;MATCH (m:Movie) WITH m
column2: size(m.countries) AS countryCount ORDER BY countryCount DESC LIMIT 5 RETURN m.title AS title

column1: List the top 5 actors by number of different genres they've acted in.;MATCH (a:Actor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre) WITH a
column2: count(distinct g) AS genreCount ORDER BY genreCount DESC LIMIT 5 RETURN a.name AS actor

column1: List movies directed by ‘Quentin Tarantino'.;MATCH (d:Director {name: Quentin Tarantino’})-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie) RETURN m LIMIT 3
Which actor has the highest average IMDb rating across all of their movies released in the 21st century?;"MATCH (a:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) WHERE m.year >= 2000 AND m.imdbRating IS NOT NULL

column2: AVG(m.imdbRating) AS avgRating ORDER BY avgRating DESC LIMIT 1"

column3: debutMovie.imdbRating ORDER BY debutMovie.imdbRating DESC LIMIT 1"

column1: Which actor or actress made their debut in the highest-grossing comedy film of the 1980s?;"MATCH (m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre)

WITH m ORDER BY m.revenue DESC LIMIT 1

WHERE m.year >= 2010 AND m.year < 2020 AND m.revenue IS NOT NULL and m.budget IS NOT NULL

column1: Find all directors who released their first movie (released) after the year 2000 and have directed at least one movie with an imdbRating over 8.6. Name those high-rated movies.;"MATCH (d:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)

Which movie from the 2010s has a cast that includes at least one actor born before 1920?;"MATCH (m:Movie)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(a:Person)
WHERE m.year >= 2010 AND m.year < 2020 AND a.born < date(""1920-01-01"")
Find the director who has directed at least one movie every 5 years (based on year) for at least three consecutive intervals
Find the oldest living director who has directed a movie in the 'Documentary' genre.;"MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre {name: 'Documentary'})
WHERE p.died IS NULL AND p.born IS NOT NULL

column2: p.born AS birthDate ORDER BY p.born ASC LIMIT 1"
